hook.text: A startup launches confidently, ignoring a competitor's patent. A lawsuit shuts them down. They never scanned threats.

buildup.text: SWOT maps Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats. It's the simplest framework for strategic assessment.

discovery.text: Strengths and weaknesses are internal; opportunities and threats are external. Strategy lives at their intersection.

twist.text: Most teams overcount strengths and undercount weaknesses. Honest SWOT requires brutal self-awareness, not optimism.

climax.text: Use SWOT to generate strategic options: leverage strengths, shore up weaknesses, seize opportunities, mitigate threats.

punchline.text: Know yourself and your environment. Then act.
